Title: AIPatrol-Bandits
Descriptions: Some bandits have taken over Devil’s Castle and are causing chaos — raiding supplies, ambushing travelers, even shooting up nearby towns. They’ve turned that old fortress into a stronghold. It’s time someone put an end to it. Think you’re up for the task?
Head up to Devils Castle and clear out the bandits. They are a small group but they are well armed and dangerous. Be careful.
Devil’s Castle is clear? That’s a big win. Those bastards had it coming. You did good — thank you. Here’s your reward.
ObjectiveText: Kill all units of the bandit patrol group at the marked location.
